sense.def:
One's conscience
je del človekove zavesti, ki nam pove, ali je tisto, kar počnemo, prav ali narobe.

seg.quote: My conscience told me to vote against the others.

sense.def:
To have a guilty conscience
pomeni občutiti krivdo, ker smo storili nekaj slabega.

Conscience
je početje, ki je po našem mnenju pravilno, čeprav je morda na splošno nepriljubljeno, težavno ali nevarno.

seg.quote: In all conscience, I couldn't make things difficult for him.
The exercise of conscience is an individual act.
